title: WOMEN VERSUS ROMAN EMPIRE
description:
In this planet , the history of womenÃ‚Â´s rise to dignity starts in 

      Europe , and in Europe the root to investigate is twofold:

      the roman catholic church and her "father" , the roman empire.


      It all started when so many roman aristocratic warriors died far away from

      the Urbs. Then it was decided that women could ... inherit. Then ,  the inner 

      logic of roman law made it necessary to declare them CITIZENS...


      The book explains this very strange roman trajectory , unique in the ancient 

      world  and culminated in Paris , about 1789 (at least on paper).

...................................................................................


     JUDITH EVANS GRUBBS

     WOMEN AND THE LAW IN THE ROMAN EMPIRE 
     a sourcebook on marriage , divorce and widowhood.

     Routledge 2002 , 374 pages


+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
